headline: BofA Adjusts Elevance Health (ELV) Target to Reflect Higher Sector Valuations
summary: Elevance Health, Inc. (NYSE:ELV) is included among the 12 Best Long Term US Stocks to Buy Now. On December 16, BofA lifted its price target on Elevance Health, Inc. (NYSE:ELV) to $385 from $370 and kept a Neutral rating. The firm noted that its higher target reflects richer multiples across the peer group. Elevance Health, [因

headline: JPMorgan Reinstates Palo Alto Networks (PANW) With Overweight Rating
